A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dumbfounded by the bad reviews... This was a fantastic movie. Main story was he character development and archs of Rey\, Ren\, and Luke - and it was done beautifully. The movie was gorgeous. The action was the best it's been. Everything about this movie was unbelievably good. 

SPOILERS AHEAD


The main criticisms by fans:
Luke dies "randomly" and for "no reason" = Yoda's death 
Snoke's backstory was never explained before death = the emperor
Ray comes from nobody = Anakin (but in reality\, Ray's story is better. Ray's fear is that she is nobody. This plot point adds to her story)
Phasma was worthless = Boba after

The only legitimate general criticism I've read is that the casino side plot wasn't necessary. It wasn't. But it was certainly fun to watch\, and added a couple new interesting characters. 

*END OF SPOILERS*

So maybe people just overhyped this movie in their head? I don't see any huge plot flaws that weren't present in ESB. This movie was different and refreshing. Far better than TFA. Don't listen to the fanboys on this one. This was th best of the series!
